name: Magicae Mundi BETA
description:
You have magical powers and must use them for survival in this action game!

The match starts when you enter a scenario, at which point it is time to use all your skill controlling one of the magic characters in the game. Use your strategy to defeat your opponents before they defeat you, the winner will be the last to stay alive in the match!

Main features:

° Free Content Updates
° Choice of one of several servers scattered globally for better experience
° Choose one of the scenarios when creating a game
° Choice of one of the characters
° Play online individually or as a team
° Each character has four powers, his main attack, his strongest attack, his magical defense power and his magical healing power
